# CheckHeaders

## DuplicateHeaderKeys

<!-- 'Description' and 'Properties' sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- DON'T TOUCH ME - I'M USED BY VALIDATOR DOC AUTO-GENERATION CODE -->

### Details

Instead of having multiple headers with the same key, multiple values should be added to the same header and separated by a comma.
